mapper.sql: tmp_id, dev_imei, col_time, types, content, rpt_time, deal_sign, deal_time, owner_id
mapper.insert:
insert into tn_tmps
tmp_id,
dev_imei,
col_time,
types,
content,
rpt_time,
deal_sign,
deal_time,
owner_id,

mapper.update:
update tn_tmps
dev_imei = #{devImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
col_time = #{colTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
types = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rpt_time = #{rptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deal_sign = #{dealSign,jdbcType=CHAR},
deal_time = #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where tmp_id = #{tmpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tn_tmps set dev_imei = #{devImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, col_time = #{colTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, types = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rpt_time = #{rptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deal_sign = #{dealSign,jdbcType=CHAR}, deal_time = #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where tmp_id = #{tmpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tmp_id, dev_imei, col_time, TYPES, content, rpt_time, CASE WHEN deal_sign='0' THEN '未处理' WHEN deal_sign='1' THEN '已处理' WHEN deal_sign='2' THEN '处理异常' END deal_sign, deal_time, owner_id FROM tn_tmps order by tmp_id desc limit #{pb.startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{pb.endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
